entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Tobermory
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:10 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Tobermory
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:03 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tobermory 09:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Temperature: 0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 69 %
Dewpoint: -4.2°C
Wind: E 20 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow mixed with freezing rain beginning this morning then changing to rain showers this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 this morning. High plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to flurries this evening. Local blowing snow. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 70 after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
